plot: Two foreign students from China grew a habit of peeping into a girl's room across the street. One day, they catch another guy doing the same thing, simultaneously getting caught by him as well.
title: Chuang
plot_es: Two foreign students from China grew a habit of peeping into a girl's room across the street. One day, they catch another guy doing the same thing, simultaneously getting caught by him as well.
plot_en: Two foreign students from China grew a habit of peeping into a girl's room across the street. One day, they catch another guy doing the same thing, simultaneously getting caught by him as well.
